title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Body Swap
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A skeptic who volunteers for a "harmless" body swap ritual at a mystic hostel finds herself trapped in the dying body of a terminally ill elderly woman, unable to return to her own healthy form before it expires.

death_teaser: Be careful what body you wish for.
